content: weight of yarn with corresponding hook size to make a larger or smaller chick note again that this will change the yardage requirements © 2018 danielle comeau designs all rights reserved it is illegal to redistribute sell or share the pattern in part or in whole electronically or physically a b running stitch around the neck at the decrease row running stitch tightened and secured c d chick with eyes and beak embroidered and a tuft of looking adorable feathers added on top about danielle is an avid maker in all forms basically if it has to do with fibre she s into it on the constant quest for work-life balance danielle also owns brick and mortar shop spun fibre arts www spunfibrearts com in oakville ontario where she spends time when she isn t being a mom to 4 kids and a cat pattern support contact info @spunfibrearts info@spunfibrearts com
